title: Standing Up To the Madness: Ordinary Heroes In Extraordinary Tim
description:
Standing Up To the Madness: Ordinary Heroes In Extraordinary Times by Amy Goodman, David Goodman

Requirements: Epub reader, 272kb

Overview: Standing Up to the Madness not only is a timely, inspiring, and even revolutionary look at who wields the greatest power in America--everyday people who take a chance and stand up for what they believe in--but also offers advice on what you can do to help.

Where are the millions marching in the streets to defend human rights, civil liberties, and racial justice? Where is the mass revulsion against the killing and torture being carried out in our name? Where are the environmentalists? Where is the peace movement?

The answer: They are everywhere
